apaGeneratorDescription: This tool automatically generates APA 7th edition citations from a list of publication URLs or DOIs provided in an Excel or CSV file.
footerText: Built by a world-class senior frontend React engineer.

errorNoOrcidIds: Please provide at least one ORCID iD or upload a file.
errorSelectFile: Please select a file to process.
errorSelectSourceColumn: Please select the column containing the IDs.
errorInvalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload a CSV or Excel file.
errorNoProfilesInFile: No valid author profiles found in the file.
errorNoProfiles: No valid author profiles with a 'SCOPUS' ID found in the file.
errorNoOrcidProfiles: No valid author profiles with an 'ORCID' ID found in the file.

zenodoDescription: This will fetch all publications from Zenodo affiliated with:
zenodoDisclaimer: The process may take several minutes depending on the total number of publications.

errorFetchZenodo: Failed to fetch data from Zenodo
errorFetchOpenAlex: Failed to fetch data from OpenAlex
apaErrorInvalidFileType: Please upload a file in .xlsx or .csv format.
apaErrorEmptyFile: File is empty or has an invalid format.
apaDragOrClick: Drag and drop a file here or click to select
apaExcelItalicTitle: Creating Italics Between Asterisks in Excel
apaExcelItalicStep1: Press Alt + F11 → the Visual Basic Editor will open.
apaExcelItalicStep3: Paste the following code into the new module:
apaExcelItalicStep4: Return to Excel → select the cells with asterisks → press Alt + F8 → choose ItalicBetweenAsterisks → click Run.
apaExcelItalicStep5: The text between *...* will become italic, and the asterisks themselves will disappear.
menuSubtitle: Please select a tool to get started.
menuInstructionsDesc: Learn how to use each tool available in the application.
menuScopusDesc: Fetch author publications and metrics from Scopus API.
menuOrcidDesc: Retrieve publication works from an author's ORCID profile.
menuUnifiedProfileDesc: Combine Scopus and ORCID data into a single, deduplicated author publication list.
menuAdvancedSearchDesc: A flexible tool to get either full publication lists or summary statistics for authors.
menuZenodoDesc: Find publications from Zenodo affiliated with a specific university.
menuApaDesc: Automatically generate APA 7 citations from a file of URLs or DOIs.
menuBatchDesc: Merge data from multiple tables or remove duplicate entries.
menuOpenAlexDesc: Fetch publications from OpenAlex affiliated with a specific ROR.
menuHIndexCalculatorDesc: Calculate an institution's h-index by fetching all its publications from Scopus.
menuManualVisualizerDesc: Create charts by manually entering raw or summary data.
menuUnpaywallDesc: Check Open Access status for a list of DOIs.
menuScopusCitationDesc: Analyze citation growth year by year for a specific author.
menuRadioDesc: Manage and listen to your personal music library.
menuUsefulLinksDesc: A collection of useful resources and web links.
noTracksInLibrary: Your library is empty. Add some tracks to get started!
dropFilesHere: Drop audio files or a .zip archive here to add them to your library
authorStatsDescriptionByYear: Generates a detailed report with KNU-affiliated publication counts by type for each author, broken down by year.
groupedStatsDescriptionTotal: Generates a summary report with KNU-affiliated publication counts by type, grouped by a selected column.
groupedStatsDescriptionByYear: Generates a detailed report with KNU-affiliated publication counts by type, grouped by a selected column and broken down by year.
errorNoKnuPublications: No publications with KNU affiliation found in the selected year range.
errorNoGroupingColumn: Please select a column to group by.
errorNoPublicationsForYears: No publications found for the selected year range.
authorStatsDescriptionOrcidByYear: Generates a detailed report with publication counts by type for each author, broken down by year.
groupedStatsDescriptionOrcidSummary: Generates a summary report with publication counts by type, grouped by a selected column from your file.
groupedStatsDescriptionOrcidByYear: Generates a detailed report with publication counts by type, grouped by a selected column and broken down by year.
authorStatsDescriptionUnifiedByYear: Generates a detailed report with KNU-affiliated publication counts by type for each author, broken down by year.
groupedStatsDescriptionUnifiedSummary: Generates a summary report with publication counts by type, grouped by a selected column from your file.
groupedStatsDescriptionUnifiedByYear: Generates a detailed report with publication counts by type, grouped by a selected column and broken down by year.
errorNoRowsAfterFilter: No rows match the current filter criteria.
batchUploadInstruction: Upload multiple CSV or Excel files
batchNeedTwoFiles: Please upload at least two files to configure a merge.
batchErrorMissingConfig: Merge configuration is incomplete. Please select both tables, their key columns, and at least one column to add.
batchErrorOnMerge: An error occurred during the process
batchInsertAtEnd: At the end of the table
fillGroupDescription: Adds a new column and fills it with values from designated group header rows.
fillGroupNeedOneFile: Please upload a single file to process.
fillGroupErrorConfig: Configuration is incomplete. Please select a header column, enter a new column name, and choose an insertion point.
fillGroupErrorOneColumn: This tool requires a file with at least two columns to distinguish headers from data.
dedupNeedOneFile: Please upload at least one file.
dedupPrimarySourceTitle: 1. Priority Source (its data will be kept on match)
dedupColumnsInstruction: For each table, select the same set of columns to check for duplicates.
dedupErrorConfig: Please select a priority source and configure columns for at least one table.
dedupErrorMismatch: The number of selected columns for comparison must be the same for all tables.
dedupErrorSelectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one column for comparison in each configured table.
instGettingStartedDesc1: Before you begin, it's important to understand the basic workflow for most tools:
instGettingStartedLi1: Step 1: Provide Data. Upload an Excel file or enter identifiers (e.g., Scopus IDs, ORCID) manually into the text area.
instGettingStartedLi2: Step 2: Enter API Keys (if needed). For tools that require API access (like Scopus), ensure you have entered a valid API key in the appropriate field.
instGettingStartedLi3: Step 3: Configure Settings. After loading a file, additional options will appear. Select the necessary columns (e.g., the column with IDs), set year ranges, and apply other filters.
instGettingStartedLi4: Step 4: Run the Process. Click the 'Fetch Data' or 'Process' button to begin.
instScopusDesc1: This tool fetches publication data and h-index from the Scopus database for one or more authors.
instScopusLi2: Provide Scopus Author IDs, either by typing/pasting them one per line, or by uploading an Excel file containing a column with the IDs.
instScopusLi3: Optionally, set a year range to filter publications.
instScopusDesc2: The results will be displayed in an interactive table where you can search for specific entries and sort by any column. The table can be exported to Excel. You can also generate and download various statistical reports based on the fetched data.
instScopusLi5: Group statistics by author or any column from your uploaded file.
instScopusLi6: Generate reports as a summary or broken down by year.
instOrcidDesc1: This tool retrieves publication records from one or more ORCID profiles.
instOrcidLi1: Provide ORCID iDs, either by typing/pasting them one per line, or by uploading an Excel file with a column of ORCID iDs.
instOrcidLi3: You can enable additional metadata services (CrossRef, DataCite, Zenodo) to enrich the results with more details like volume, issue, and page numbers.
instOrcidDesc2: Like the Scopus tool, you can search, sort, and export the final table to Excel, and generate various statistical reports.
instUnifiedProfileDesc1: This powerful tool combines publication data from an author's Scopus and ORCID profiles into a single, comprehensive list.
instUnifiedProfileLi1: Upload an Excel file containing columns for both Scopus Author IDs and ORCID iDs.
instUnifiedProfileLi2: Select the correct columns for Scopus and ORCID identifiers.
instUnifiedProfileLi3: Choose a deduplication method. 'Standard' is faster, while 'Advanced' uses fuzzy matching for better accuracy with title variations.
instUnifiedProfileDesc2: The tool fetches data from both sources, merges them, and removes duplicates. The final, clean list is displayed in an interactive table. A log of removed duplicates and a list of items for manual review can be downloaded.
instAdvancedSearchDesc1: This flexible tool allows you to get either a full, deduplicated publication list or a summary statistical report for authors from Scopus and ORCID.
instAdvancedSearchLi1: Step 1: Select Input Source. Choose 'Manual Input' for typing IDs directly, or 'File Upload' for processing an Excel file.
instAdvancedSearchLi2: Step 2: Provide IDs. Enter Scopus and/or ORCID IDs as needed based on your source selection.
instAdvancedSearchLi3: Step 3: Choose Output Mode. Select 'Full Publication List' for a detailed table, or 'Statistical Report' for aggregated data.
instAdvancedSearchLi4: Step 4: Configure Settings. Adjust deduplication and metadata settings as you would for the Unified Profile tool.
instAdvancedSearchDesc2: The tool first fetches and deduplicates all data. If you choose 'Statistical Report', you can then generate and download a report based on the cleaned data, either by author (for files) or as an overall summary.
instZenodoDesc1: This tool finds all publications in the Zenodo repository affiliated with 'Taras Shevchenko National University of Kyiv'.
instZenodoLi2: Simply click the 'Fetch Data' button to start the search.
instZenodoDesc2: The process may take several minutes depending on the total number of publications.
instOpenAlexDesc1: This tool fetches all publications from the OpenAlex database affiliated with 'Taras Shevchenko National University of Kyiv'.
instOpenAlexLi1: Optionally, set a year range to filter the results.
instOpenAlexLi2: You can select specific publication types (e.g., article, book) to include in the search.
instOpenAlexDesc2: The results are shown in an interactive table that you can search, sort, and export to Excel.
instApaDesc1: This tool automatically generates APA 7th edition citations from a list of publication URLs or DOIs provided in an Excel or CSV file.
instApaLi1: Upload a file containing a column with either the full URL to a publication's webpage or its DOI.
instApaLi2: In the configuration section, select the column that contains the URLs/DOIs.
instApaLi3: Choose where to place the generated citation: you can either add it to a new column or overwrite the data in an existing column.
instApaDesc2: After processing, you can download a new Excel file containing all your original data plus the generated APA citations.
instTableDesc1: This module provides powerful tools for working with multiple data tables. You can either merge tables based on a common key or remove duplicate entries across several files.
instTableMergeDesc: Use this mode to combine data from two tables.
instTableMergeLi1: Upload at least two Excel files.
instTableMergeLi2: Select a 'Primary Table' (the one you want to add data to) and a 'Secondary Table' (the one you're taking data from).
instTableMergeLi3: For each table, select a 'key column'. This column should contain matching identifiers in both tables (e.g., author IDs, DOIs).
instTableMergeLi4: Select the columns from the Secondary Table that you want to add to the Primary Table.
instTableMergeLi5: Choose where to insert these new columns.
instTableDedupeDesc: Use this mode to find and remove duplicate rows across one or more files.
instTableDedupeLi1: Upload all files you want to process.
instTableDedupeLi2: Select a 'Priority Source'. If a duplicate is found, the row from this source file will be kept.
instTableDedupeLi3: For each file, select the exact same set of columns to use for comparison (e.g., 'Title' and 'Year'). The tool will consider a row a duplicate if the values in all selected comparison columns match.
instHIndexDesc1: This tool calculates the h-index for a specific affiliation (e.g., a department or university) based on Scopus data.
instHIndexLi3: Set the year range for calculation.
instHIndexDesc2: The tool will scan publications for each year, calculate the total citations, and determine the h-index. A list of publications with citation counts can be exported.
instUnpaywallDesc1: This tool checks the Open Access status of publications using their DOIs.
instUnpaywallLi1: Upload an Excel/CSV file containing a column with DOIs.
instUnpaywallLi2: Select the column that contains the DOIs.
instUnpaywallDesc2: The results will be displayed in a table, showing the original data along with the access status and a direct link to the PDF if available. The entire table can be exported to Excel.
instManualVizDesc: This tool allows you to create charts from data you enter manually, without needing to upload a file.
instManualVizRawDesc: Define your own columns and fill in the rows. The chart constructor will then aggregate this data for visualization. Useful for plotting frequencies or counts from categorical data.
instManualVizSummaryDesc: Directly enter aggregated data, similar to the image you provided. This is ideal when you already have summarized information (e.g., publications per year) and want to quickly visualize it.
openAlexDescription: This will fetch all publications from OpenAlex affiliated with:
unifiedDeduplicationStandardDesc: Matches publications by DOI, or by exact title and year. Faster but less accurate with minor title variations.
unifiedDeduplicationAdvancedDesc: Matches by DOI, then uses a fuzzy-matching algorithm on titles. More accurate for variations but slightly slower.
unifiedManualReviewAvailable: Potential duplicates were found that may require manual review.
unifiedMatchThresholdDesc: Similarity score (from 90% to 100%) above which publications are considered duplicates and automatically merged.
unifiedReviewThresholdDesc: Similarity score (from 80% to 96%) above which publications are flagged for manual review if they are not a definite match.
unifiedDeduplicationLogDesc: {{count}} duplicate publications were removed. You can download a log file for review.
chartErrorXAxis: Please select a column for the X-Axis.
chartNoData: No data available for the selected criteria.
chartEmptyDueToFilter: All values deselected. Select values to display the chart.
orcidAuthorStatsCompletenessDesc: Generates a report for each author showing the total number of publications, the count and percentage with a DOI, a breakdown by data source, and the percentage of works added by the author.
statsByYearDesc: Generates a report with publication counts by type, broken down by year.
statsSummaryDesc: Generates a summary report with publication counts by type.
visualizeDesc: Upload a single table to build charts and visualize your data.
visualizeNeedOneFile: Please upload a file to start visualizing.
hIndexDescription: This tool calculates the h-index for an institution by fetching all its publications from Scopus, bypassing the 5000-record limit by querying year by year. The process can take several minutes.
hIndexErrorAffiliationId: Please provide a valid Scopus Affiliation ID.
manualVizDesc: Manually enter your data in either raw or summary format to generate custom visualizations.
manualVizCalculateGrowthTooltip: Calculates growth based on the previous row. Ensure rows are in chronological order.
unpaywallDescription: Check the Open Access status of publications using their DOIs.
unpaywallEmailLabel: Your Email Address (required by Unpaywall API)
unpaywallErrorEmail: Please provide an email address to use the Unpaywall API.
scopusCitationDesc: Analyze citation growth year by year for a specific author.
scopusCitationErrorConfig: Please configure all columns before processing.
dedupErrorConfigInteractive: Please select at least one column for comparison.
advancedSearchStatReportDownloaded: Statistical report by author generated and downloaded.
advancedSearchStatsMetadataReminder: Note: To generate a statistical report, the full publication list is fetched first. Please ensure you select the necessary metadata fields, as they are used for calculations.
advancedSearchPreviewDescription: This is the final, deduplicated data that will be used for the report.
linkPanMykhailoDesc: Pan Mykhailo is a digital assistant for the Mykhailo Maksymovych Library of KNU. It helps readers and researchers find academic materials, navigate scholarly sources, and locate official information about library services and KNU resources.
linkJournalSplitterDesc: JournalSplitter AI is an intelligent Gemini AI-powered web tool for automatically splitting PDF journal issues into individual articles, extracting metadata, and generating ready-to-use SAF packages for export to DSpace repositories.
linkMusicArchiveDesc: A collection of audio files for your personal library. You can download this archive, unpack it, and add the tracks to the Radio 7 module.
